Desc.entry: A not-for-profit organisation that offers a free service to local residents, businesses and organisations in Sheffield. Seeks a society where everyone who wants to work can find employment. Aims to create and support the expansion of suitable, quality employment opportunities; to increase employment in the most deprived communities through the strengthening of local economies; to facilitate the development of recruitment and workforce development practices through the Employer Liaison Team; to offer an alternative route to recruitment; to develop new and innovative labour market entry programmes and to help fill hard to fill vacancies.

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
